attributes.action: Make it compulsory for every business and council in the United Kingdom to enforce recycling on all products which can be recycled. Penalties and a list of worst offenders to those who fail to adhere to this scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A law passed like this could begin to substantially reduce waste in the United Kingdom, rather than simply relying on the individuals to recycle; usually restricted to glass, paper and tinned products.
